title: Higher ping lately?
body: Anybody else have this? Up until a week and a half ago, I played on a steady, sexy 37 ping since the server shift. Now it's up to 150. What the hell's going on?

replies.body: Is the 150 ping consistent or happening sporadically?  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of these matches and find out what's really going on.  Let me know what you find!

http://prntscr.com/d5o7na

This is what I found from yesterday.

http://prntscr.com/d5o80y

This is what I found from a month ago.

Clearly there's a drastic spike in ping, could you recommend anything? I've had no change in wireless service, before you ask.

Thanks for the information here!  Don't fret, this gives us a really good picture of what's happening!  It looks like your network is having trouble keeping a strong connection and that can be caused by local problems or even how your ISP is routing to us.  I suggest going over each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities and even fix this up for good.  Hopefully, that will do the trick!

I'm sorry to bother but I've seen people with high ping and lag spikes as well for about 2 weeks

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/nEF4V74q-ridiculous-lagping-spikes-for-the-last-week-dont-seem-to-be-the-only-one
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/g3ztVxLT-riot-please-na-has-been-lagging-for-two-weeks

You're not the only one:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/g3ztVxLT-riot-please-na-has-been-lagging-for-two-weeks

Also been having terrible ping and lag spikes and seen many people who have the same issues. 0 answers from Riot.

Because riot has no idea. This happens every major patch when they change stuff.  I spent like 2 months dealing with riot support over fps drops, sent them the same info during that period  countless times and got nothing but the same generic responses every time. 

Dealing with riot support is like watching 2 retards have sex, not sure if you want to laugh at them or feel bad for their sheer stupidity
